about_the_game:
Sam Vs (a lot of) DJs is a rhythm game involving combat mechanics, transforming each punch and each dodge into a flawless choreography. Immerse yourselves in the rave scene and test your reflexes in the fast-paced and complex rhythms of electronic music.

Play as Sam, a normal young woman with an above average feeling for music, and help her defeat the djs who stole her usb keys, stealing her merit for the title of best dj of Acid City.

Featuring tracks from some of the best electronic music producers from France's new golden generation, expect a journey through deep basslines, heavy kicks and hypnotic acid melodies.

Note from the developper : This prototype is still under heavy development and will be updated regularly throughout 2025 (and 2026 ?). Come back from time to time to see this simple concept become a deep and rich musical, visual and mechanical experience.
